author: Marketing Services
title: Kim Marie Mahfood Releases ‘Ginger’s Quest’
text:
Author Kim Marie Mahfood has realized that life is a constant journey of change and learning, and throughout her life’s journey she has learned many things about love and relationships. In “Ginger’s Quest” (published by AuthorHouse) she uses her multitude of experiences to create a fun and eye-opening read that shows her character and optimistic views on life. “ Ginger’s Quest ” is about a midlife situation that happens to many people throughout the world. It follows a woman who goes through many challenges in her life and has to figure out how to move forward. It shows how she combined her spirituality and sense of humor to face her life. It also showed how she explored all avenues of self-help and ultimately became even stronger than she was before. The book provides readers with a heartwarming look on life and all its facets encouraging them to look to God for guidance.
The author has gone through a myriad of experiences concerning relationships and matters of the heart and throughout it all she managed to become a better and stronger person. The author is sure that readers will laugh throughout this book and feel inspired to be their best selves.
“Ginger’s Quest”
By Kim Marie Mahfood
Softcover | 6x9 in | 60 pages | ISBN 9781504954044
E-Book | 60 pages | ISBN 9781504954037
Available at Amazon and Barnes & Noble
About the Author
Kim Marie Mahfood was born on the island of Kingston, Jamaica. She received her undergraduate degree from the University of North Carolina at Greensboro and received her master’s degree from Nova Southeastern University, Fort Lauderdale. She has worked in various fields, including mental health counseling, the export and import business, public relations and marketing, and now works with a nonprofit helping the poor throughout the Caribbean and Latin America. Her life has been rich with international travel and amazing family and friends.
AuthorHouse, an Author Solutions, Inc. self-publishing imprint, is a leading provider of book publishing, marketing, and bookselling services for authors around the globe and offers the industry’s only suite of Hollywood book-to-film services. Committed to providing the highest level of customer service, AuthorHouse assigns each author personal publishing and marketing consultants who provide guidance throughout the process. Headquartered in Bloomington, Indiana, AuthorHouse celebrated 15 years of service to authors in Sept. 2011.For more information or to publish a book visit authorhouse.com or call 1-888-519-5121.
